member.name: T:TestApplication.GanttChart
member.summary:
Adds a Gantt Chart to the form This is for private use only. For use in non-private projects you'll need permission from me, which can be obtained by contacting me: Adagio.81@gmail.com
Created by Adrian "Adagio" Grau
Version 0.54

If you want to "hide" the bar from mousemove event
